1: A song for going up to worship. Those who trust the Lord are like Mount Zion, which can never be shaken. It remains firm forever.
2: {As} the mountains surround Jerusalem, so the Lord surrounds his people now and forever.
3: A wicked ruler will not be allowed to govern the land set aside for righteous people. That is why righteous people do not use their power to do wrong.
4: Do good, O Lord, to those who are good, to those whose motives are decent.
5: But when people become crooked, the Lord will lead them away with troublemakers. Let there be peace in Israel!
